cfca.util
Class CertUtil

java.lang.Object
  cfca.util.CertUtil

public class CertUtil
extends java.lang.Object

CertUtil class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return X509Cert

Since:
1.4
Version:
3.1.0.1
Author:
wlhe, He Weilin

getCertExtensionData

public static byte[] getCertExtensionData(X509Cert cert,
                                          java.lang.String oid)
                                   throws PKIException
Get certificate extension data from a X509Cert object by the oid.

Parameters:
cert -
oid -
Returns:
certificate extension data. If a certificate has no extension data, returns null.
Throws:
PKIException - If an error occurs when getting extension data from X509 certificate

Parameters:
sm2Path - the path of the SM2 file
Returns:
Throws:
